story.text: A thinking tool is an extension of your brain and body.  Books, internet, spoken languages, pencils and paper, computers, libraries, wikis, databases (on paper cards or computers), are all [[Thinking Tools]].

We have more access to thinking tools today than we did hundreds of years ago. Google is a great thinking tool because there is no need to drive your vehicle to the library or book shop in order to get quick information.
